abstract: Sends the provided data to the remote workout session.

declaration.code: func sendToRemoteWorkoutSession(data: Data, completion: @escaping (Bool, (any Error)?) -> Void)

overview:
## Discussion

Call this method to send data to your remote workout session. You can send data from either the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKWorkoutSessionType/mirrored] or [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKWorkoutSessionType/primary] session.

items.description: Starts mirroring the workout session to the companion iOS device.
items.name: startMirroringToCompanionDevice(completion:)

items.description: Stops mirroring the workout session to the companion iOS device.
items.name: stopMirroringToCompanionDevice(completion:)

title: sendToRemoteWorkoutSession(data:completion:)
